amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to direct the GAO to conduct a report on sectoral bargaining in other countries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to direct the GAO to conduct a report on sectoral bargaining in other countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stevens amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stevens amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Stevens.
